title: 5E-Based Online Educational Framework for Strengthening Practical Research Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Optimized accessibility for smartphone-based learners, emphasizing practical research methodologies applicable to real-world contexts.

learning_goals: Learners will independently conduct a research design that solves real-world business problems following the 5E instructional model.
Learners will be able to write a research report applicable to organizational improvement based on collected data.
Learners will identify areas for improvement in the research process through peer feedback and self-assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
